name: Panda Tap
description:
This is a game I made to challenge myself.

To create the art, audio and programming.

The gist of the story is help a panda run away from monsters.

Bamboo(s) - Speeds up the walk speed;

Random Boxes - Either speeds you or the monster chasing you.

Controls : press G and H alternatively to help our hero run.

p.s. Please help our panda run, He loves to do nothing and just sleep.
